summary: New colours for the Dragonebone armors.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my bad English, and for the potentials grammatical errors.
=======================================================================================

[b]INFO[/b]

Thanks you guys for the 300+ downloads !

Check the pics ! =)

=======================================================================================

[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]

The original colors of the Dragonbone armor did not suit me, so I decided to make new ones.

This is my first mod, so for start, I\'ve just doing a re-coloring with White and Orange.

Too, I\'ll add some new colours soon, and if you have any ideas what I could do, ask me in the comments.

Check the pics for see what the armor looks like ! If you like the colours, endorse and let me know on the comments. =)

=======================================================================================

[b]INSTALLATION[/b] Put the armor file here --> Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures

[u][b]If you have installed the HD textures pack of Bethesda:[/b] [/u]
Open your \"Skyrim.ini\" file, find \"sResourceArchiveList\", and change it to: \"sResourceArchiveList=Skyrim - Misc.bsa, Skyrim - Shaders.bsa, Skyrim - Textures.bsa, HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa, Skyrim - Interface.bsa, Skyrim - Animations.bsa, Skyrim - Meshes.bsa, Skyrim - Sounds.bsa\"

\"Skyrim.ini\" can be find here: Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

After that, launch the game by the classical launcher, click on Data files and disable \"HighResTexturePack01.esp\" and \"HighResTexturePack02.esp\"


[b]UNINSTAL:[/b] Just delete the \"dragonbone\" file.

=======================================================================================

[b][u]NOTE[/b][/u]

[u]02/10/12:[/u] White and Red Dragonbone armor 2k ver. 1.10 [b]Male and female available.[/b]

[u]02/08/12:[/u] White and Red Dragonbone armore 2K ver. 0.90   [b]Only male available.[/b]

[u]02/07/12:[/u] White and Orange Dragonbone armor ver. 1.0   [b]Male and female available.[/b]

[u]02/06/12:[/u] White and Orange Dragonbone armor ver. 0.90   [b]Only male available.[/b]
author: Zexen
